New Records: Fazalhaq Farooqi completed his maiden five-wicket haul for Afghanistan in international cricket
Key Match Events: Farooq castled Ronak Patel (4) with an inswinger on the second delivery
Trapped Roger Mukasa in front of the stumps on his first delivery
Reduced Uganda to 18/5 with Mujeeb Ur Rahman joining the action in the next over
Scraped two in the fifth over to further reduce Uganda's score
Struck on a hat-trick for the second time after picking up two consecutive wickets in the 13th over
